title: Should I play rank?
body: I been playing this game for so many years and the highest I reach was diamond. I quit like 9 months ago due to my pc blowing up, now I'm back and if I should play rank again. I heard alot of people saying that rank isn't worth it due to all the changes but I want to hear your guys oppinion.

replies.body: no. don't do it. ranked is a flaming toxic shit swamp inhabited with every kind of troll known to league. and what is your reward for trudging through it? a lame ass victorious skin. there are better skins you can buy straight.

> [{quoted}](name=Inkling Commando,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GEfVXKev,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-14T20:02:23.298+0000)
>
> no. don't do it. ranked is a flaming toxic shit swamp inhabited with every kind of troll known to league. and what is your reward for trudging through it? a lame ass victorious skin. there are better skins you can buy straight.

jesus
ye go ahead and do it if your willing to see how good you are at league or if u want to be competitive

1- Can you play League without your laptop going Hiroshima?
2- Think you are able to play ranked right after 9 months of not playing? You might need to play some normals because a lot happened in the 9 months. Like a lot.
3- The new ranked got removed. Apparently it's a failure. However, i heard that the MMR is a mess.

Not sure why the "jesus" part, but i'm not sure why i'm saying this but...

I'm agnostic. XD
